sentences.en: Away with their rings, chains, hooks, and pincers!
sentences.cn: 他们的环, 链, 钩和钳子, 请滚开!

sentences.en: Crabs have two sharp and large pincers.
sentences.cn: 螃蟹有两个又大又锋利的钳子.

sentences.en: He worked with a pair of pincers.
His surgical instruments were a knife and a pair of pincers.
sentences.cn: 他的外科手术器械是一把刀和一把钳子。

sentences.en: In the meantime the outer pincers had met and closed.
sentences.cn: 同时,外圈钳形围攻的部队已经会师合围.

sentences.en: Pincers poised and eyes gleaming , a bulldog ant surveys its surroundings.
sentences.cn: 钳子平衡、眼睛雪亮, 一只“斗牛犬”蚁正在侦查环境.

sentences.en: Quick - adjustment Hydraulic System: Quick regulations on pincers & fingers, maximizing machine performance.
sentences.cn: 快速调整 型 油压系统 --- 爪子 及 指头等压力调整方便, 发挥机器最佳性能.

sentences.en: Regular light pincers are often compared to chopsticks or paired fingers.
sentences.cn: 普通光钳的作用颇类似一双筷子,或一对手指头.

sentences.en: The point is to keep one stick still and move the other so as to make them wok like pincers.
sentences.cn: 要点是让其中的一根筷子保持不动，活动另一根筷子，以便能像钳子一样夹取食物。

sentences.en: The point is to keep one stick still and move the other so as to make them work like pincers.
sentences.cn: 要点是让其中的一根筷子保持不动，活动另一根筷子，以便能像钳子一样夹取食物。

sentences.en: This paper introduces the identification items and methods of the digital pincers phase volt - ampere meter.
sentences.cn: 介绍了数字钳形相位伏安表的检定项目及其检定方法.

sentences.en: When he tightened the pincers leftbear away and went to a pile of straws and slept.
sentences.cn: 把钳子扭紧后,便丢开不管了,跑到一堆稻草上睡起觉来.

trans.tran_cn: 钳子，（虾、蟹等的）螯，（甲壳动物的）螯； 钳子( pincer的名词复数 )，拨钉钳
